TermDefinition.DefinitionText: The fruit of the hawthorn tree or bush. It has been used in some cultures to treat certain medical problems, including heart problems and gastrointestinal problems.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "fruto del espinoalbar"

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Fruto del árbol o el arbusto del espino. Se ha usado en algunas culturas para tratar ciertos problemas médicos, incluso problemas cardíacos y gastrointestinales.
